title: Sativa Music Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Mediterranean, Juice bar, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe by day, bar and music venue by night. Menu is veg-friendly and healthy. Vegan possibilities include 2 sandwiches, 2 salads, and bruschetta. Herbal teas and fresh juices. Owners are aware of what vegan means.
streetAddress: Market St, across from Beer House
